title: Check if Array Includes Any Values
description: In this lab, we will be exploring a JavaScript function that checks if an array includes any values from another array. We will be using the Array.prototype.some() and Array.prototype.includes() methods to implement the includesAny() function. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to efficiently check for the presence of values in arrays using JavaScript.

meta.title: Checking if an Array Includes Any Values
meta.description: Explore a JavaScript function that checks if an array includes any values from another array using Array.prototype.some() and Array.prototype.includes().
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, javascript lab, includes, javascript tutor, array, some, programming

steps.title: Check if Array Includes Any Values

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
